ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: Skins that don t work are: Giant Snake Skin Shark Skin Kerra Gaurd Skin Dicey ... From: Truitt, Darla/SEA [mailto:dtruitt@ch2m.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 23,
ygData.messageBody:
Skins that don't work are:

Giant Snake Skin
Shark Skin
Kerra Gaurd Skin

Dicey

-----Original Message-----
From: Truitt, Darla/SEA [mailto:dtruitt@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 11:03 PM
To: 'EQ_Potters@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials


Those should work. I have better success with zombie skins, besides they
are stackable and light-weight. Any non-ruined SKIN (not pelt) should work.
I have tried various animal skins with success.

I thought enchanters only needed regular vials. They use lined too??

Tanana (Bristlebane)
Master Brewer
Master Potter
Master Beggar

-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Testa [mailto:caroljt@...]
Sent: November 23, 1999 2:46 PM
To: EQ_Potters
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials




Does anyone know what type pelts are needed to make
lined vials? I have been asked to make some for an enchanter friend.

I have tried 1 lined Vial sketch, one flask water, 1
small block of clay, and either a High Quality Bear skin or a Zombie skin.



Chrysiana

Master Potter Cazic Thule
